attributes.action: Disregard the petition by Katherine Anne Richards calling for greater control of the BNP
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I defend the right of a legitimate UK political party (BNP) registered with the Electoral Commission, to promote their policies in any way they see fit, and to leave it to the common sense views of the British public to make up their own minds at election time.

rejection.details: as a rule, we don't accept petitions about other petitions
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
